headline: Miller Launches ArcCapture™ Weld Camera Systems
summary: APPLETON, Wis. APPLETON, Wis., January 12, 2026--Miller Electric Mfg. LLC, a leading manufacturer of arc welding equipment, has announced the release of its ArcCapture weld camera systems, designed to enhance training, instruction and efficiency in both educational and automated welding environments.
